summary: These innovations are not just about green progress but also represent a significant shift in our approach to sustainability
One such example is the widespread adoption of solar power
According to reports from the International Energy Agency (IEA), global solar power capacity reached 1,762 GW as of 2020, representing a substantial increase from 843 GW in 2019
